Functions
IOS FIFO Common Utilities
Interface Examples

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides shared functionality for IOS FIFO mode examples, implementing common initialization, board setup, and pin configuration display routines used by both controller and device components.

Key Features

  1. System Configuration: Implements low-power and cache settings for optimal performance
  2. Debug Interface: Sets up ITM printf capability for status and debug output
  3. Pin Documentation: Provides detailed pin connection diagrams for hardware setup

Functions

  • Board initialization and power configuration
  • Cache system setup and optimization
  • Pin connection visualization and documentation
  • Debug interface configuration

Functions

void common_setup (void)
